## AUC (ROC Curve)

* Receiver Operating Characteristic (ROC) curve



* Mean Absolute Error (MAE)

$$MAE = \frac{1}{N} \sum\left|y_{pred} - y_{actual}\right|$$

* Mean Squared Error (MSE)

$$MSE = \frac{1}{N} \sum\left(y_{pred} - y_{actual}\right)^2$$

* Root Mean Squared Error (RMSE)

$$RMSE = \sqrt{MSE}$$
